task_name: Tournament Event Loop Evaluation - FRESH START

phases.name: Initial Setup & Planning
phases.description: Create blueprint.json, WIP.md, and define comprehensive evaluation plan

phases.description: Create benchmark targets in config.mk following examples

phases.name: Run Linux Benchmarks
phases.description: Execute tournament benchmarks on Linux (via Docker)

phases.name: Initial Comprehensive Report
phases.description: Write complete report with methodology, conditions, results, analysis

phases.name: Investigate Interesting Facets
phases.description: Use runSubagent to investigate specific questions from findings

phases.name: Investigate Emergent Questions
phases.description: Investigate 5 questions that emerged from integrated findings

phases.name: Final Recommendation and Documentation
phases.description: Create final summary and refine ALTERNATE_IMPLEMENTATIONS.md

phases.description: Update documentation based on final validated analysis

subtasks.name: Create blueprint.json
subtasks.description: Initialize project blueprint with all phases

subtasks.name: Create WIP.md
subtasks.description: Initialize work-in-progress tracking file

subtasks.name: Analyze config.mk examples
subtasks.description: Understand make-all-with-log and make-all-in-container patterns

subtasks.name: Define tournament-macos target
subtasks.description: Create make target for macOS tournament benchmarks with logging

subtasks.name: Define tournament-linux target
subtasks.description: Create make target for Linux tournament benchmarks via Docker

subtasks.name: Execute macOS benchmarks
subtasks.description: Run tournament on macOS with all implementations

subtasks.name: Verify macOS results
subtasks.description: Ensure all benchmarks ran successfully and data was captured

subtasks.name: Execute Linux benchmarks
subtasks.description: Run tournament on Linux via Docker with all implementations

subtasks.name: Verify Linux results
subtasks.description: Ensure all benchmarks ran successfully and data was captured

subtasks.name: Write comprehensive report
subtasks.description: Document methodology, results, analysis in master report

subtasks.name: Investigate latency anomaly
subtasks.description: Root cause: Missing fast-path in alternates causes 10-100x latency

subtasks.name: Investigate AltThree Linux degrade
subtasks.description: Root cause: Missing channel fast-path + eventfd overhead = 14.6x slower

subtasks.name: Investigate AltTwo GC strength
subtasks.description: Root cause: TaskArena + lock-free + minimal clearing = 72% better under GC pressure

subtasks.name: Investigate Baseline competitive latency
subtasks.description: Root cause: goja_nodejs uses same channel tight loop pattern as Main

subtasks.name: Analyze AlternateTwo hybrid opportunity
subtasks.description: Concept: Combine AltTwo's GC strength (-72%) with Main's fast-path for +22-100x latency

subtasks.name: Review for additional questions
subtasks.description: Identify emergent questions from integrated findings - found 5 total

subtasks.name: Integrate findings into master report
subtasks.description: Investigations 1-3 integrated, 4-5 detailed in separate docs

subtasks.name: Investigate remaining emergent questions
subtasks.description: Questions: AlternateOne safety features, Running vs Sleeping anomaly, Cache-line platform variation

subtasks.name: Refine ALTERNATE_IMPLEMENTATIONS.md
subtasks.description: Update documentation to reflect actual findings (DONE ONLY after exhaustion)

subtasks.name: Final verification and cleanup
subtasks.description: Ensure everything is DONE DONE - no loose ends, all docs integrated
